Caption: Mrs. Shanti Sengupto (Director’s wife) hands over  a prize to Mr. Y. S. Ramaswamy (Superintending Engineer)
Description: The Third Institute Day took place at the Institute’s Building Sciences Block on the IITM campus. The Institute Day of IIT Madras is a day marked to celebrate and recognize the hard work and success of people who have shown excellence in academics as well as extracurricular activities. In the image, Mrs. Shanti Sengupto hands over a prize to Mr. Y. S. Ramaswamy (Superintending Engineer). Also seen in the image, behind Mr. Y. S. Ramaswamy, is Mr. Anand Singh Bawa (founding editor of Campastimes, an IIT students’ publication)
